label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_013
content:
## 2026-01-15 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS 22500 req | p50: 17ms p95: 41.1ms p99: N/A | err: 0.07% (16 errors) | success: 99.93%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /health-check: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /cache-purge: REQUESTS N/A | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /change-request: REQUESTS 6 req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 28% | Mem 61% | Disk 75% | Conns: N/A | Net: 78/108 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 22% | Mem 49% | Disk 56% | Conns: N/A | Net: 60/77 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 47% | Mem 66% | Disk 51% | Conns: N/A | Net: 98/136 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 33% | Mem 72% | Disk 61% | Conns: N/A | Net: 15/20 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-axfr: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-ixfr: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-dnssec: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-ttl: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-propagation: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 88.7% | Bandwidth: 0.9 Gbps | Origin requests: N/A

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNSSEC bogus validation event on signer-01: 1 event
- [INFO] Propagation to 36 cloud edge sites completed; average propagation time 63s, p95: 150s
- [INFO] Zone transfer success rate: AXFR 99.0%, IXFR 99.5%
- [INFO] TTL changes applied: 48 records across 7 zones; min TTL 300s, max TTL 43200s, median 3600s
- [INFO] Change requests processed: 6; all applied successfully; mean apply time 18 min
- [INFO] DNSSEC zones signed: 68; signature refreshes: 122; DS mismatch: 0; bogus events: 1
- [INFO] Health checks: authoritative reachability 99.99%; SOA mismatch 0; lame delegations 0

### Deployments & Changes
- Expanded to 36 cloud edge sites; validated reachability and observed improved p95 propagation after edge addition
- Migrated next batch of 16 zones; executed DNS record parity tests including SRV and CAA records; no discrepancies found
- Removed remaining console write permissions for production DNS project; all changes now via IaC pipeline with approvals
- Completed DNSSEC ZSK rotation for 10 zones; monitored for bogus validations and found none material

### Events
- Expanded to 36 cloud edge sites; validated reachability and observed improved p95 propagation after edge addition
- Migrated next batch of 16 zones; executed DNS record parity tests including SRV and CAA records; no discrepancies found
- Removed remaining console write permissions for production DNS project; all changes now via IaC pipeline with approvals
- Completed DNSSEC ZSK rotation for 10 zones; monitored for bogus validations and found none material

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: H. Kim. 1 pages. 4 tickets. Status: Normal; successful batch migration and security hardening for change controls
